game.name: Bonnie Kidney Transplant
game.description:
Do you want to see your kid performing complicated surgical procedures in hospitals in future? Are you planning to guide your kid towards her passion of becoming a doctor? Tell her to join Bonnie Kidney Transplant game and help her to learn some medical terms! In this free online doctor game for girls, you as a player will have to play the role of a medical surgeon who performs the kidney transplant surgery of a cute girl. This morning two beautiful girls named Barbie and Ellie have been admitted in your hospital. 

Barbie is suffering from a problem in her kidney, so you have advised her to transplant her kidney immediately. Her best friend Ellie has decided to donate her kidney. So, Ellie is playing the role of a donor and Barbie is playing the role of a recipient in this brand new doctor game. Help Barbie to go through a safe transplant procedure so that she can get back to her normal life! Try to finish all the remaining tasks before taking her to the operation room! Do the proper medical analysis to check if their kidneys are compatible. Also put an iv for each of the girls and give them anesthetic cocktail.

Check out the recovery procedure and also look into the one through which you attach the right organ to Barbieâ€™s body. Have you done all! Great job, girls! Now you all have to wait for the time when these two close friends will recover after going this procedure. After doing the transplant, dress up these two gorgeous girls with the perfect outfits for their first, memorable outing. Good luck, ladies to have a blast in this cool PC and mobile game!
